languages.text: Принятие Хартии, гарантирующей простолюдинам некоторые права, — скандальное решение. Благодаря ей горстка выборных простолюдинов присоединится к аристократам, управляющим Даргонусом.

The adoption of the Charter, a document that grants certain rights to commoners, is a scandalous decision. This step will allow a small group of elected commoners to rule Dargonus alongside the aristocracy.
languages.original_text: Принятие Хартии, гарантирующей простолюдинам некоторые права, — скандальное решение. Благодаря ей горстка выборных простолюдинов присоединится к аристократам, управляющим Даргонусом.

traits.locale_text: The adoption of the Charter, a document that grants certain rights to commoners, is a scandalous decision. This step will allow a small group of elected commoners to rule Dargonus alongside the aristocracy.
The adoption of the Charter is a scandalous decision, allowing elected commoners to rule the world — alongside hundreds of aristocrats.

The adoption of the Charter, a document that grants certain rights to commoners, is a scandalous decision. This step will allow a small group of elected commoners to rule Dargonus alongside the aristocracy.
The adoption of the Charter is a scandalous decision, allowing elected commoners to rule the world — alongside hundreds of aristocrats.

The adoption of the Charter, a document that grants certain rights to commoners, is a scandalous decision. This step will allow a small group of elected commoners to rule Dargonus alongside the aristocracy.

The adoption of the Charter, a document that grants certain rights to commoners, is a scandalous decision. This step will allow a small group of elected commoners to rule Dargonus alongside the aristocracy.

languages.text: L'adoption de la charte, un document qui accorde certains droits aux gens du commun, est une décision on ne peut plus scandaleuse. Cette mesure permettra à un petit groupe de citoyens élus de gouverner Dargonus aux côtés de l'aristocratie.
languages.original_text: The adoption of the Charter, a document that grants certain rights to commoners, is a scandalous decision. This step will allow a small group of elected commoners to rule Dargonus alongside the aristocracy.

traits.locale_text: L'adoption de la charte, un document qui accorde certains droits aux gens du commun, est une décision on ne peut plus scandaleuse. Cette mesure permettra à un petit groupe de citoyens élus de gouverner Dargonus aux côtés de l'aristocratie.

languages.text: チャーターの採択は胡散臭い決断だ。権利を与える文書である。この措置により、選挙で選ばれた少数の平民が貴族と一緒になってダルゴナスを統治する可能性を作ってしまうのだ。
languages.original_text: The adoption of the Charter, a document that grants certain rights to commoners, is a scandalous decision. This step will allow a small group of elected commoners to rule Dargonus alongside the aristocracy.

traits.locale_text: チャーターの採択は胡散臭い決断だ。権利を与える文書である。この措置により、選挙で選ばれた少数の平民が貴族と一緒になってダルゴナスを統治する可能性を作ってしまうのだ。

languages.text: 这份宪章法案会让平民同样拥有权利。批准这份法案是一项可耻的决定，因为一旦批准，一小群民选议员将会与贵族阶级共同统治达戈努斯。
languages.original_text: The adoption of the Charter, a document that grants certain rights to commoners, is a scandalous decision. This step will allow a small group of elected commoners to rule Dargonus alongside the aristocracy.

traits.locale_text: 这份宪章法案会让平民同样拥有权利。批准这份法案是一项可耻的决定，因为一旦批准，一小群民选议员将会与贵族阶级共同统治达戈努斯。

languages.text: La adopción de la Carta, un documento que otorga ciertos derechos a la plebe, es una decisión escandalosa que permitirá que un pequeño grupo de plebeyos elegidos por sus iguales gobierne Dargonus junto a la aristocracia.
languages.original_text: The adoption of the Charter, a document that grants certain rights to commoners, is a scandalous decision. This step will allow a small group of elected commoners to rule Dargonus alongside the aristocracy.

traits.locale_text: La adopción de la Carta, un documento que otorga ciertos derechos a la plebe, es una decisión escandalosa que permitirá que un pequeño grupo de plebeyos elegidos por sus iguales gobierne Dargonus junto a la aristocracia.

languages.text: Die Verabschiedung der Charter, eines Dokuments, das dem Pöbel gewisse Rechte einräumt, ist eine skandalöse Entscheidung. Dieser Schritt gestattet es einer kleinen Gruppe gewählter Bürgerlicher, gemeinsam mit der Aristokratie über Dargonus zu herrschen.
languages.original_text: The adoption of the Charter, a document that grants certain rights to commoners, is a scandalous decision. This step will allow a small group of elected commoners to rule Dargonus alongside the aristocracy.

traits.locale_text: Die Verabschiedung der Charter, eines Dokuments, das dem Pöbel gewisse Rechte einräumt, ist eine skandalöse Entscheidung. Dieser Schritt gestattet es einer kleinen Gruppe gewählter Bürgerlicher, gemeinsam mit der Aristokratie über Dargonus zu herrschen.

languages.text: Avama belli haklar tanıyan İmtiyazname'nin benimsenmesi skandal bir karar. Bu adım sayesinde aristokratların yanı sıra seçilmişlerden oluşan küçük bir grup da Dargonus'un yönetiminde söz sahibi olacak.
languages.original_text: The adoption of the Charter, a document that grants certain rights to commoners, is a scandalous decision. This step will allow a small group of elected commoners to rule Dargonus alongside the aristocracy.
